body:
Hello Avicus Network!
Yesterday I pulled off an amazing 4 hour stream on Nebula and it's gonna happen again at 1PM AEST thats in about 4 hours... I will be going LIVE on my livestream channel playing with you awesome people! If you're interested in popping into the stream  I will be live on twitch.tv my channel is (twitch.tv/shadowolfyt) hope to see you all there.

Also if you can't watch the stream and play at the same time you can also watch it on the Twitch app on the App Store see you all in 4 hours!!!

Twitch: twitch.tv/shadowolfyt
Twitter: twitter.com/shadowolfyt
YouTube: youtube.com/shadowolf365

replies.body:
Go shadowolf!!!!

we need people like you getting the server out there in the media!!! 

Keep going buddy and keep the server alive!!
